welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Paullo, Italy! This charming city is known for its beautiful architecture and delicious cuisine. We invite you to immerse yourself in the local culture and discover all that Paullo has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used mainly for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited to certain areas or have a time limit.
